transcript:

Customer: Are you speaking from KGM construction? Who is speaking?
Executive: Good morning sir, who do you want to talk to?
Customer: Who do you want to talk to, then my
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, speak sir, speak.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, yes sir, speak, your voice is coming.
Customer: Hello.
